Usage: apic {{services}}

  List the currently executing services

  {{$ apic services}}
  Service {{climbon}} running on port 4001
  Service {{climbon-gw}} running on port 4002

Type "apic COMMAND -h" for help on the following related commands:

  {{services:start}}    Start a service
  {{services:stop}}     Stop a service
  {{services:logs}}     Get the logs
  {{services:get}}      Get a service
